name: OR_CASE_QUEST_ANS
description: The OR_CASE_QUEST_ANS table contains OR management system case questionnaire answers.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the case answer.

columns.name: IS_USER_ADDED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the questionnaire was added by the user.
